name: Atomic Dame [DEMO]
description:
Story

Play as "Sarah" who lost her right arm and parents in a car crash when she was 9 years old. Due to this, she becomes a test subject for a experimental arm that is also a weapon, however she is a test subject for 10 years and the amount of testing finally takes a toll on her as she has never been given the chance to grieve over the loss of her parents. On this day, she finally breaks out of the place that kept her captive for so long. Slice and dice anyone who comes in your way with the prototype sword that happens to be a part of her arsenal and her pistols as well which are good to turn people into cheese.

Keyboard Controls
Gamepad Controls

The same button layout is for all controllers.
